channel.title: Sambhav Singh Rohatgi
channel.description: Recent content on Sambhav Singh Rohatgi

item.title: Segment Anything
item.description: These are notes for my reading of the segment anything paper. Check out the orignal project page by Meta AI at the link below Segment Anything by Meta AI High Level # Main idea behind the model is to build a foundational model for Computer Vision similar to the state of the NLP community + allow it to be promptable.

item.title: Using Radar Plots to Compare Model Performance
item.description: Motive # Does looking at a table comparing model peformance across multiple metrics feel bothersome to you? Lets see how radar plots can help us quickly visually compare model performance across multiple metrics.

item.title: My Professional Timeline
item.description: This page is a work in progress SpaceSense Aug 2021 - now ML Engineer and Researcher Developed a pipeline to automate training of time series crop type segmentation models from vector label data.
